review_text: It was everything I needed as I traveled! Adam was very responsive and helpful.
Cozy and convenient--especially to Panther Creek State Park. Super comfy bed. Quiet neighborhood.

We enjoyed our stay here. The place was super cute and the perfect size for my husband and I. Adam was very quick to communicate with us and left us a personalized note and a treat! We would definitely stay here again!

This adorable little studio apartment has everything a single person or couple would need during their stay. Super clean and well-kept in a location that is near everything in town and easy to get to other areas and attractions. We would stay again!
Host was very communicative
10/10 very nice place
The studio is as posted. Clean, nice, no issues and a good value.

flexible checkin, coded door entry. no rooms, just a studio sized apartment, but as it has all the amenities, the bathroom is well supplied, the bed is adjustable (awesome). Only complaint id have is if you plan to sleep in, there is trains in the area. otherwise, awesome stay.
Great cute studio. It is nice and well taken care of. Adam is a courteous host. I would stay again!
Cute, clean, conveniently located!
Super clean place, perfect for our halfway stop for a long trip.

The home has recently been remodeled, squeaky clean, well organized, with lots of thoughtful extras such as a great sound machine (trains nearby), room darkening shades (I do suggest a sleep mask if you are sensitive). Adam couldn't have responded more quickly, accommodated better, or left clearer instructions. Thank you!
It was good
Perfect for my needs

We had a wonderful stay, the place was very cozy, clean and had all the amenities we needed. It’s located in a great part of town, close to the supermarket, gas stations, restaurants and the mall. Overall we had a great stay and would definitely recommend and return in the future.
Adam’s listing was a great spot for me and my guest. It was right by everything and it was very comfortable to come back to. Would definitely book again if given the chance.
We needed a place to stay for 2 weeks. I work from home, and I needed good Internet. This place met all our needs and it was very affordable. Adam was also very helpful.
Very nice little studio! perfect for my husband and I for the weekend. The studio was very nicely updated and clean. we had a great weekend stay!!
very affordable and clean. my stay was lovely and peaceful. the host was very responsive and easy to reach. would stay here again!!!

We had a great stay, I worked remotely for a couple of days and the internet connection was great. the place was clean and in a great location. There was great communication from the host. We would stay there again.

Adam's place was very cozy and nice. We loved staying there. The walls are a little thin so make sure your TV isn't too loud. The neighbors also kept hitting the shared wall so that was a little annoying but I don't think it was anything Adam could have helped. Also there is no washer and dryer so be prepared for that. All in all, it was super clean and nice. We would definitely stay here again.

We needed a place to stay medium term and Adam’s little place was perfect.
The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge/freezer, microwave, oven, sink and counter tops. The bathroom has a shower with multiple settings and good pressure, a toilet and a sink. It also has fast wifi, a Roku and a comfortable bed.
Autumn at Adam’s place was gorgeous, the two big trees in front of the place had beautiful autumnal colouration through October and November.
Adam was very accommodating while checking in, allowing us to check in early and move in for the stay. Throughout our stay he checked on us and washed the linens weekly on our terms, while being respectful our privacy.
The neighbours were very friendly and quiet.
In terms of walkability there is a pals, food city and gym across the road. Downtown is a 20 minute walk and the mall is a 30 minute walk.
We really enjoyed our stay and we highly recommend it to others.
Hugo and Alyssa
Amazing place definitely worth it. I would definitely recommend.

My husband and I came down for a wedding, and Adam's place was perfect for what we needed. It is close to downtown and a grocery store, and within 10 minutes, you have shopping and restaurants. We definitely recommend the Hillbilly Cabin. We ate there twice it was so good. We loved the cozy feel to the space. The furniture was nice and comfy. Having a stove and full refrigerator was nice as well. The house is on a busy road mainly during the day but you don't notice the noise while inside. Adam is very responsive and friendly. He answered any questions we had. We did have a minor issue, but Adam took care of it right away, and it did not affect our stay one bit. I would recommend staying here and would stay here again. Thank you for sharing your beautiful and welcoming space.

I would book this anytime I came to Morristown. So clean and well taken care of inside. Adam was excellent in communicating and you could walk to the grocery store, Starbucks, a Hamburg joint, and fitness center. The bed left a little to be desired. Thanks Adam and hope to see you again in the future. Mark and Audrey

Great host, the studio was well decorated and clean. It had a full kitchen, plenty of extra linens and blankets, and a comfortable couch. Maybe the bed needs to be replaced because one side was sloped downward to where it felt like you could roll out of the bed.

Beautifully decorated. Everything like new. Very thoughtful and practical details.
Very good communication.
Small place but perfect for two people. Very quiet surroundings. Nice back porch with comfortable chairs and peaceful view.
No washer and dryer, no dishwasher.
It is a great affordable place for a short stay.
Adams place was beautiful and so comfortable. Id love to stay again the next time I’m in town visiting family.

Nice cozy wonderful space had everything that I needed. Other amenities were close and a short drive to the mall. The home was super clean. I will keep this on the short list of places when I go back home to visit family.
Exactly as pictured and felt at home.
It was most enjoyable and relaxing. We really had a good time. If we come back we would like to stay at the same place. It was close to everything.

My stay here was absolutely amazing. The place was perfect for my needs, especially staying long term. Adam was a FANTASTIC host. They often checked up on us and were always responsive in a very quick manner.
I was actually very sad to leave. Would go again in a heartbeat.
Great little place. Comfortable and perfect for our needs

Adam’s place was extremely clean and welcoming! Modern but comfortable. This was perfect for my husband and I to stop for a quick overnight to break up a long road trip. You can’t beat the price with all the amenities. So glad we stayed here instead of an average hotel room that would have cost more for less amenities.
Quiet neighborhood and place fully accommodated for a brief stay.

Adam's Place was perfect for our stay. It was very clean and we loved the decor. It looks just like the pictures. The bed mattress was so comfortable and so was the bedding & pillows. It was set up with all the necessities we needed for our stay. The host was very nice and responded quickly when I reached out to him. We appreciated the suggestions for restaurants in the area that are in the guidebook. We would highly recommend Hillbilly's Cabin restaurant. The food was really good. The books on the coffee table with suggestions for things to do were a nice touch. We really think the sound machine was a great idea and used it every night. We want one for our home now. The USB outlets on the nightstands were a great touch. The studio has great lighting and when the curtains are closed they block the outside light really well. The parking spaces are right in front of the house and you can back up close to the door for easy loading & unloading of a vehicle. We would definitely stay again.

I really enjoyed my stay here. The studio is extremely clean, well-appointed and tastefully decorated. The Wi-Fi worked great for working, and the kitchen - although small - is amazingly well stocked and had everything I needed!

This was a great stop for an overnight stay! Everything was clean and comfortable, and the host was responsive. My only note is that there were quite a few bugs that I had to deal with (no bed bugs though!). While I was comfortable with managing them being from the South, and I think it'd just a product of being in a warm climate, it may not be the best location for you if you typically don't do well with bugs like spiders. Otherwise, I was very happy with the accessibility of the space, especially the shower seat. (For wheelchair users I'd note that there are ledges, but the area is pretty spacious enough to wheel around, and the bed is lower to the ground.) Thank you!
place was very nice and comfy exactly what you would want for a studio and hosts were kind and very responsive

We had a unplanned trip to Morristown as my Mother In Law had just passed.
Adam was very responsive to my messages and was extremely helpful. We had to make adjustments to our reservation and he went with the flow.
I liked how the place was located in a quiet part of town. The next door residents were friendly as well. Looks like a Police Officer lived up the road so that added to the sense of security. There is a nice grocery store within 2-3 blocks as well.
This place was sooo nice! Nice touches, good lighting, bed was comfortable and so clean!
I’d would stay again if I’m in the area.
Thank you
Very friendly host. Very clean and cute studio. Great location.

I spent one night here due to attending a graduation the next day. The home was very beautiful. He even had a booklet made with recommendations of popular restaurants and local spots. He was very responsive and answered quickly. I would absolutely book with Adam again.
Great large and clean airbnb A++++

Adam’s place was newly remodeled and spacious; very clean and comfortable with nice furnishings. He communicated clearly and was quite responsive. Convenient driveway parking right in front makes unloading easy. There is a cozy backyard patio. This is a duplex with a family living next door.

Adam is a fantastic host. The place is just as describe, furniture clean and comfortable. The bed was very comfortable and I have back issues. I will stay again when in Morristown. He is very responsive and let us know right when the house was ready.
Angel

Adam's space was beautifully decorated, well approved, and immaculately cleaned. I can't think of one detail that wasnt thought of. I loved the decor and will be using some of the design choices as inspiration for my own home. The bed was plush and comfortable. We were only there for sleep and shower due to our itinerary comimg back from Florida but wished we could have stayed longer.

This is a nice studio if you coming into just need a comfortable nice quick stay! Personally it was a bite noisey due to the neighbors that are connected to the apartment and games from the baseball field which were actually nice at times but keep alot of traffic. Pros the studio was spacious, comfortable and really really clean!! Also I want to stay how great Adam was as a host, he was very responsive and accommodating. I would book again just would probably book if I was alone amd not working from wherever I am. Overall it's a 7.5/10 only bc of the location
I will definitely try to stay here the next time we're in Morristown. Such a great place
It exceeded my expectations, everything was clean, warm and welcoming.
very clean. very cute. very accommodating.
Great spot for a short stay in Morristown.
Adam was super quick to respond and very agreeable to last minute changes I had. Place was quiet and clean, very good location to restaurants, grocery, and food.
Was a great space and very well set up! Just what I needed

If you are coming to Morristown I highly recommend this place. I honestly can’t say enough great things about Adam’s place. It is exactly as described in the listing and as pictures show. It is probably the best studio I’ve ever stayed in, and I’ve been to many as a travel nurse. It was very spacious, clean and had everything we needed for our stay. Bed was super comfortable and the sound machine was the extra bonus points. So many things that are very detail oriented I could go on and on. Host is quick to respond to messages. Absolutely beautiful.
We loved this cute little place. Would definitely stay again. It was so clean and cozy! The neighbors were also friendly. Can’t beat the price either.

Don't hesitate to book this place. Perfect size for a quick stay in Morristown. The studio is very well equipped with lots of nice comfortable furniture and amenities. Both the bathroom and kitchen are spotless and have everything you might need. The location is quiet, I'm a light sleeper and typically don't sleep well when I travel. I got a good night's sleep both nights during my stay thanks to the very comfy bed and the provided fan. The value of this place is amazing, it really punches above its price point.

I was hoping we’d see the mountains there was no view of the mountains but we were tired when we got here so we just stayed inside most of time nicely had coffee for us a full-size refrigerator for us to cooler drinks great job Adam

This was perfect for a quick night's rest. Adam was flexible with check-in which was convenient since we were traveling and stopping in the middle of the night. It was easy to find at 4am. The layout is simple yet it provides a full kitchen, comfortable couch and chair, clean bathroom, and kitchen table. The bed wasn't comfortable to me but I had no issues with moving to the couch. It is close to a road but a noise machine was provided to help block out the unwanted noise. We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again during our travels from PA to Memphis. Adam was great communicating with me throughout the process.

This is a really cozy and efficient place! Close to grocery stores, food and other shopping. Inside its all one room but its a huge space. Nice big comfy couch, flat screen Roku TV, nice sized kitchen. I loved the little details like having a luggage rack! This place is basically brand new, spotless and really well done. No issues with noise, had its own temperature control as well. Bed was comfy as were the pillows. Only downside was, its not sitting on a box spring so the bed is lower to the ground. My suggestions for future guests would be to leave the porch light on, as it was difficult to see the keypad at night. The lights inside were VERY bright. I couldn't keep them on as it made the place bright white. I opted to just leave 1 on it, so perhaps softer lighting. There are now darkening shades so this gets plenty of sunlight. I will keep this place in mind!!
Awesome! Well stocked place! Very helpful host! Thanks for the great stay!
Excellent place for a business traveler or a couple. Nice, clean, and cozy.

Although we were only there one night we really did enjoy our stay. It was so much better than staying in a hotel room. Everything was new and clean, beautiful decor with very nice touches. Extra blankets, plenty of pillows, kitchen had everything you would need for an extended stay. I know it sounds like a little thing but having the water bottles available was great being we forgot to stop before checking in. Very thoughtful hosts.

My wife and I needed a place to stay overnight on our way to Bristol, TN. The apartment was close enough to the highway that we didn’t have to drive very far out of our way. The inside was recently remodeled and cozy. Plenty of cooking utensils if you plan on cooking while you stay there, although we did not have time. The place was a great value, I would recommend staying there.
Great place clean and comfortable!

If there were a 10 star review this adorable little spot would get my rating!
Spotless, extra accommodating host, exceptionally equipped, very cozy atmosphere!
Planning on making it my go to spot when traveling in the future!
Adam's place was very cozy. it has its own door to the outside and it's own off street parking. It was clean and nice. There was occasional noise that sounded like a train in the distance.
Adam was great and very helpful! He was a gracious host and very responsive to any questions.
it was amazing, really comforting and one of the best prices over ever gotten

I just wish we had more time to stay in Morristown. It was a lovely town, and the home was super cozy and had everything we needed. If we'd stayed longer I know we would have called it our home away from home spot. if I'm ever back to the area, I would recommend the home and find it very cozy and quiet, peaceful neighborhood.
great place would definitely stay again

Would definitely stay here again!
Such a cute little house and was everything we needed for our weeks stay.
Kevin’s home was great. Centrally located to anything that you could ever need. We’d highly recommend a stay here if you are passing through

Kevin’s place was immaculate. It was clean, packed with amenities, and very comfortable. It is much more spacious than the photos are able to represent. Kevin has also equipped his place with the most updated technology, charging stations, and much more. It is definitely worth the money and I would love to stay again. We loved it so much we started to ask him if he’s accepting tenants! LOL
This place was so comfortable and had everything you could need, easy to find and get inside. It felt like a home you could stay long vacation time in.

We enjoyed our stay in this cute house! It was very clean and well furnished for an overnight stay. It was easy to find and we felt right at home in it! Beds were comfortable and the electronic house manual was exceptionally detailed, including local attractions. Would not hesitate to stay here again and can recommend this as a great place with a great host!
If you need a place to stay in Morristown or near Jefferson City, this is perfect! I had everything I needed.
I enjoyed my stay. Great place!!

This place was great! My mother-in-law was in Morristown-Hamblen hospital and this place was so convenient. It was so nice to be able to stay here and not have to worry about anything during a stressful time! The kitchen had everything we needed to cook which saved us from having to eat hospital food every day! Also - there was SO MUCH parking.
Great location. Very clean. Booked last minute, and everything was perfect.

This was such a sweet place! The interior was spotless and beautifully decorated. So comfortable and tastefully done. We look forward to our next stay

The place is beautifully decorated and extremely clean. Seemed to have everything that I needed and Kevin made sure that he was available for any questions that arose! I was extremely pleased and am already booked for my next stay!

Great location for central needs in town, the tacos y Tortas food truck near by is a must do.
We had some issues with WiFi but seemed to work most of the time.

Great location, easy to get to, close to the main drag, CLEAN, cozy, they had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again if we are in the area. We were very pleased. Kevin was quick to respond to all my questions. This was our first time using Airbnb. I hope all future stays, go as easy as this one.
We’ve stayed at numerous of Kevin’s Air BNB’s. He’s a wonderful host. The house was very clean, there were plenty of linens and towels, everything was as described. I highly recommend this stay.
Enjoyed my stay!

We booked with Kevin twice during very sad circumstances and it was so comforting to have a nice place to stay after flying from across the country. The home is very comfortable, clean, and in a quiet safe neighborhood. We had everything we needed at our fingertips and our host made sure we were well stocked in necessities. An added bonus was being so close to historic Morristown, shops, and restaurants.
Great house, great host!
Everything was as advertised! Host was very responsive and the instructions were very detailed and clear on everything from check-in/check-out to operating the TV.

This home was just what we needed for our stay there!! They house was clean and smelled great!! This home was beautiful and relaxing. The beds felt so good!! The kitchen had everything you needed coffee and utensils and crock pot to cook a good meal! The shower was clean and beautiful!! We loved the stay there, plus we was able to invite my in-laws for dinner one night and they loved the house!! We will definitely stay again!! Thank you for a very beautiful home! Bryan and Julie Countess

I really wish that there was a fenced in area for my fur babies.
However, my overall experience was very nice. I would definitely stay there again. I highly recommend this beautiful place.
Great place to stay with pups! Would definitely return

Kevin’s place was clean, welcoming and had everything we needed. There was an issue with one of the beds and Kevin was quick to get it taken care of and communicated with us quickly. Kevin’s place was accommodating for my 1 1/2 year old. Definitely recommend Kevin’s place! There is a nice park less than a half mile from the location.
very nice place to stay.
I enjoyed my stay - felt very much at home! Very clean and comfortable house!

This was a sweet little house that was perfect for my Mom and I to stay while visiting family. While I would normally pick a more secluded location, Kevin's home was clean, comfortable and exactly where we needed to be for this trip. I felt very comfortable walking my 2 dogs around the neighborhood by myself. Kevin was very friendly and quick to respond. I didn't need an EV charger, but for a lot of folks, that would be a huge plus. If you are looking for in-town location, this is a great little home for your stay.

House was very cute. Had just about everything you could need for a stay. Very clean. Very close to a lot of food, Walmart, activities. We came down to visit Carson Newman University and it was such a nice and easy drive from the house! Would recommend! :)
5 star

Would recommend this place to anyone. I definitely would love to book this place again. The host was definitely great. Loved that he was quick to respond especially since we booked last minute. Everything was extremely clean and accessible. It felt like home the minute we walked in.

Kevin was very communicative, gave some local recommendations and made everything run flawless. Thanks for great time and great rental. Highly recommend.

Overall, I can't recommend this Airbnb enough! It truly made my trip unforgettable, and I would definitely stay here again in the future. Thank you so much for a wonderful experience!

I had a very pleasant stay! I loved the updated bathroom and the beds were comfortable. If you’re a light sleeper, note there is a train near by, but nothing ear plugs couldn’t solve. If I would definitely stay here again.
This was the perfect spot to stay on my journey across country. It was super clean and comfortable. Very quiet and easy to navigate. Definitely would recommend!

Kevin’s place was clean and just like the it was described. It was a perfect place to stay while visiting family. The house layout makes it feel spacious and it was clean. We would gladly stay here again.
This is our second time staying here. We absolutely love this place. So clean and Kevin is so nice and quick to respond. I’m sure we will be back

We are planning on coming down again for 10 days and would love to stay in it again. Thank you so very much for your help and a wonderful place

One of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed in. Kevin was just amazing. He made sure we had everything. Communication with him was great!!

Great stay! House is just as described - if not better. Kevin's communication before and during the stay was 5 stars PLUS. Kevin texted things to make the check in and check out processes super easy. I very much appreciated the info as checking texts is much simpler than signing into the app repeatedly.
I would not hesitate to stay here again. Great place to stay. The inside is gorgous and very clean.

Such a charming and perfect home! Very central to central Morristown. Would definitely stay here again.
It was like home always going to stay there

We drove by the house a couple times before we found it... right next to a local bank. The house was numbered, but we didn't see it. But after that, easy peasy access to everything in the area. The place was spotless and even has a washer/dryer for the traveler in need of one. We would definitely recommend it and plan on staying again.

This property exceeded our expectations and was the perfect spot for our family who was returning to the area to celebrate my mother’s 80th birthday. The property was very clean and had everything we needed. Kevin, our host, did an excellent job with pre and during our trip communication. I would highly recommend this property and would definitely stay again.

You won’t regret staying here. The house is very cute, spacious and clean. The location is very close to a lot of restaurants and stores. The host Kevin is amazing. He responds quick and is friendly. I would definitely stay here again.

Great cottage close to everything in town also loved the decor and layout of it was perfect.
10/10 recommend! It really felt like home and any questions or concerns were answered/ taken care of immediately at our convenience.
I would definitely recommend this cute house while spending some time in Morristown. Very comfortable and conveniently located.
If you need to stay in the Morristown, TN area, this is it. Quiet, convenient, clean, did I say quiet? Safe in town.
Great space. Had all the amenities for a long term stay. Clean upon arrival, host was very quick to respond if I texted him. Would absolutely stay again.
Very responsive.

Kevin's place was perfect. Everything we needed was right there. We were able to wash and dry our clothes. The kitchen was very clean and had everything we needed. The dinning area and livingroom where very clean and very comfortable. The shower looked new and modern. The bedrooms where very comfortable. We were close to many restraunts and stores. We hope to return again in the future.

Cozy, clean, and convenient! You can’t ask for much more out of a rental house.
We stayed for a night on a road trip and we had a great time. And it’s pet friendly!

Great location! Close to all the essentials. Stayed here because I had to work at the hospital and wanted to be close for when I was on call. Constant ATM sounds from next door and a noisy water heater but that didn’t bother me.
Kevin’s place was great. We would definitely stay again.

Upon arrival we found that the property has homes, a bank and counseling building around it. The bank does have a 24 hour ATM rather close to the house.
During our first few hours we discovered several things about this property. The couch was inviting and the TV in the living room was enjoyable. However, there are sounds of trains rumbling on tracks, the blowing of the train horns, street traffic, as well as the usage of the ATM that can all be heard in the home at all hours of the day and night. The water heater is in one of the bedrooms. It is in the closet with only a utility door. It also can be heard at all hours filling and turning itself on and off to keep the water hot.
The property does not offer recycling. But we found that it was still possible to recycle in town. The Ingles on West Andrew Johnson Highway will recycle both paper & plastic.
This is a cute little place. We had six people with adequate space to sleep. It was clean, quiet, and charming. Location was great! We will be staying again.

This house was recently updated and a very convenient location…
Perfect for a family to stay and relax!

This charming little home is definitely worth the very slight detour from your travels! It is relatively close to the interstate and within the town is close to variety of amenities. The neighborhood has plenty of safe sidewalks to walk dogs , and the unfenced yard has plenty of grass for them as well.
The house was one of the cleanest I’ve ever seen, and everything inside was aesthetically pleasing! The beds weren’t rock hard, and the house has all the basics to make a comfortable stay.
Everything was Perfect!
Fantastic house! Much larger than it looks. Very clean. Quick response time! Comfy beds. In town super convenient!
This was a great experience..it was so clean and nicely decorated .The host was so attentive to our needs..my family loved staying there.
We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend. Kevin was very quick to respond and check in was super easy. The shower is amazing. I wish we were able to stay longer.
The house was more than we expected. Great location. Communication with Kevin was great also.
Awesome place! Will stay again

Home was clean and well appointed. Also close to shopping and dining.

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Host was very responsive and helpful during my stay. I couldn't ask for a better experience!

This house exceeded expectations for sure! TBH I kept waiting to find a reason it was so well priced (aka something wrong) but everything was absolutely perfect! Super clean, well stocked, comfortable beds, and in a great little neighborhood. Will for sure stay here again on my next visit.
This is the second property of Kevin’s that I’ve stayed in. It was clean, well stocked, and a good location. Kevin had great communication. I would highly recommend to anyone coming to the area.
Great stay! The owner has arranged things in the kitchen and other areas of the house for ease of use by the renter. Nice area for our overnight stay.
Wonderful, quiet, and relaxing little slice of heaven very comfortable beds, and great kitchen

Kevin’s house was perfect. The location worked out well for me. Close to the grocery store, where I needed to be for work and I also got to explore Panther Creek State Park. The house was super clean and the kitchen was well stocked for cooking. Bed was comfortable and the house had a nice living room and dining room. Highly recommended!

Great stay, and a fantastic price! Definitely better than staying at a hotel. The home was clean, and had all of the touches that show the homeowner truly cares and wants you to have a great stay.
Our family visits Morristown often, and this will be our new go-to place! :)

This place was so nice and cozy! Very beautifully updated home with plenty of off street parking. The host was very informative of check in / check out process. Even though we never needed him, we could tell he was just a text or phone call away!
